confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

email.maxlength: Your email cannot be longer than 50 characters.

validation.maxlength: This field cannot be longer than {{ max }} characters.

validation.minbytes: This field should be at least {{ min }} bytes.
validation.maxbytes: This field cannot be more than {{ max }} bytes.
validation.pattern: This field should follow pattern for {{ pattern }}.
validation.number: This field should be a number.
validation.datetimelocal: This field should be a date and time.
validation.patternLogin: This field can only contain letters, digits and e-mail addresses.

job_section.h2: Professional CV is your ticket to the dream job
job_section.div: To start searching for jobs, you can attend job fairs online or in person, use job boards and career websites or reach out directly to recruiters in a targeted company to broaden your network.
